name: Bad_Christmas
description:
Christmas isn't like how it used to be... The man upstairs has gotten twisted and vile...

Working us to death... Literally, I need to get out, we all need to get out... Before he kills us off too...

Hurry and find the way out, it's only a matter of time before those monstrosities of our creation tear us into mush...

Controls

WASD - Move

Shift - Sprint

E - Interact

Left Mouse - Use the Holy Present

Any Key - Continue Dialog
